tier.item: (16) Orait ol salim mi na wanpela Tolai mitupela i go sikarapim ol trai kokonas na kukim
oil. Mipela mekim dispela wok i go na bihain ol i askim husait i save long painim pis.
`So they sent me and one Tolai person away, we two [mitupela] should make coconut
oil. We [mipela] did this work and went (back), later they asked who knows how to
(16) Orait ol salim mi na wanpela Tolai mitupela i go sikarapim ol trai kokonas na kukim
oil. Mipela mekim dispela wok i go na bihain ol i askim husait i save long painim pis.
`So they sent me and one Tolai person away, we two [mitupela] should make coconut
oil. We [mipela] did this work and went (back), later they asked who knows how to
Orait ol salim mi na wanpela Tolai mitupela i go sikarapim ol trai kokonas na kukim oil. Mipela mekim dispela wok i go na bihain ol i askim husait i save long painim pis.
